description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Tensions are at a high, weapons are at a ready.... and the only thing missing is a spark to set it all off. Jump in the cockpit of Leo Lucas' starfighter, and lead the way for the Martian people as the Earth-Mars conflict reaches a climatic turn in the second installment of the Honor in Vengeance series.
description.short: Tensions are at a high, weapons are at a ready.... and the only thing missing is a spark to set it all off. Jump in the cockpit of Leo Lucas' starfighter, and lead the way for the Martian people as the Earth-Mars conflict reaches a climatic turn in the second installment of the Honor in Vengeance series.
